item.title: 南非央行行长：特朗普关税使南非 10 万个工作岗位面临风险
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-卡尼亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）周三表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对南非征收关税可能会导致约10万人失业，其中农业和汽车行业受到的冲击最大。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on South Africa could cause around 100,000 job losses, with the agriculture and automotive sectors hardest-hit, central bank governor Lesetja Kganyago said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，澳大利亚即将与中国达成突破性油菜籽协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士称，堪培拉即将与中国政府达成协议，允许澳大利亚供应商向中国装运五批试验性油菜籽货物，此举将结束长达数年的贸易冻结。【原文：Canberra is close to an agreement with Beijing that would allow Australian suppliers to ship five trial canola cargoes to China, sources familiar with the matter said, a move towards ending a years-long freeze in the trade.】

item.title: 亚洲债券五个月来首次出现月度外资流出
item.description: 由于对美国关税最后期限的担忧和中东紧张局势的加剧影响了市场情绪，外国投资者在 6 月份五个月来首次从亚洲债券市场撤资。【原文：Foreign investors pulled funds from Asian bonds in June for the first time in five months, as concerns over a U.S. tariff deadline and heightened tensions in the Middle East weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国人工智能公司 MiniMax 以保密方式申请在香港上市
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，中国人工智能初创企业MiniMax已秘密申请在香港进行首次公开募股，目标估值超过40亿美元，募股可能在今年年底前完成。【原文：Chinese AI startup MiniMax has filed confidentially for a Hong Kong initial public offering, targeting a valuation of over $4 billion in the float, which could happen before the end of this year, three people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，欧盟反垄断监管机构将调查环球影业的市中心交易
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构将对环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）旗下维珍音乐集团（Virgin Music Group）斥资 7.75 亿美元收购下城音乐公司（Downtown Music）一事展开全面调查。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are set to open a full-scale investigation into Universal Music Group unit Virgin Music Group's $775 million acquisition of Downtown Music because of concerns about its impact on competition, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人工智能初创公司获得 AUKUS 自主船舶软件豁免权
item.description: 澳大利亚一家为无船员船只开发软件的人工智能初创公司表示，澳大利亚政府已授予该公司首批 AUKUS 豁免许可证，允许该公司与美国和英国的国防承包商共享信息。【原文：An Australian AI startup developing software for crewless boats said it has been granted one of the first AUKUS exemption licences by the Australian government, allowing it to share information with defence contractors in the U.S. and Britain.】

item.title: 在中国经济韧性的背后，是减薪和副业的生活
item.description: 中国国有企业员工张金明每天晚上下班后和周末送三个小时的外卖，以弥补工资减少 24% 的损失--他希望这样可以避免与同事发生尴尬。【原文：Chinese state firm employee Zhang Jinming makes up for a 24% cut to his salary by delivering food for three hours every night after work and on weekends - and hopes he can avoid awkward encounters with colleagues.】

item.title: ASML 因关税担忧拖累欧洲股市走低
item.description: 周三，欧洲股市下滑，ASML 在发布了疲软的最新业务数据后领跌，而在美国通胀数据强于预期后，投资者对关税引发的通胀的担忧使市场情绪保持谨慎。【原文：European shares slipped on Wednesday, with ASML leading losses after a weak business update, while broader investor sentiment remained cautious on concerns over tariff-driven inflation following stronger-than-expected U.S. inflation data.】

item.title: 雷诺股价暴跌 16%，原因是下调了业绩指导，任命了临时首席执行官
item.description: 雷诺汽车股价在格林尼治标准时间 7 点 19 分下跌了 16%，此前这家法国汽车制造商下调了 2025 年的指导目标，并任命财务总监明托为临时首席执行官。【原文：Shares in Renault were down 16% at 0719 GMT after the French carmaker lowered its 2025 guidance and named finance chief Minto as an interim CEO.】

item.title: 福特因起火风险召回逾69.4万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，由于燃油泄漏问题可能增加起火风险，福特将在美国召回694,271辆汽车。【原文：Ford is recalling 694,271 vehicles in the United States due to a fuel leak issue that could increase the risk of a fire, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Wipro 董事长：美国关税风险下印度 IT 需求前景仍不明朗
item.description: Wipro公司的一位高级管理人员周三表示，由于美国关税风险和全球地缘政治因素，印度价值2830亿美元的IT行业的需求前景仍不明朗。【原文：The demand outlook for India's $283-billion IT sector remains uncertain due to U.S. tariff risks and global geopolitical factors, a senior Wipro executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国和印尼企业在贸易协议前签署协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德宣布与印尼达成贸易协定，华盛顿将把印尼的关税税率从威胁性的 32% 降低到 19%。【原文：U.S. President Donald announced a trade agreement with Indonesia that would see Washington lower its tariff rates to 19% from a threatened 32%.】

item.title: 报道称阿波罗正在洽谈入股马德里竞技队
item.description: 据《扩张报》周三报道，美国收购基金阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）正在与马德里竞技队的所有者谈判，希望获得这支西班牙顶级联赛球队的大量股份。【原文：U.S.-based buyout fund Apollo Global Management is in talks with the owner of Atletico Madrid to take a significant stake in the Spanish top-flight side, Expansion newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 停止氢燃料电池计划和面包车生产
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周三表示，由于看不到中期市场的发展前景，该公司将终止氢燃料电池技术计划，今年不再推出一系列氢动力汽车。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis said on Wednesday it would discontinue its hydrogen fuel cell technology programme and no longer launch a range of hydrogen-powered vehicles this year, as it sees no development of the market in the mid-term.】

item.title: Stellantis 终止氢燃料电池技术开发计划
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 公司周三表示，将终止氢燃料电池技术开发项目，并取消推出氢能汽车的计划。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis , said on Wednesday it would discontinue its hydrogen fuel cell technology development programme and cancel the planned launch of hydrogen vehicles.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔呼吁在关税动荡中保持 "定力
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）在对商业日报《Handelsblatt》发表评论时表示，需要 "稳健之手 "来应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普最新关税威胁所带来的不确定性。【原文：European Central Bank policymaker Joachim Nagel said that a "steady hand" was required to deal with the uncertainty unleashed by U.S. President Donald Trump's latest tariff threat, in comments to business daily Handelsblatt.】

item.title: 意大利网络安全公司 Exein 完成新一轮融资，国防实力大增
item.description: 意大利科技公司Exein周三表示，欧洲国防开支的回升支持了其国内业务的增长，同时该公司完成了一轮旨在全球扩张的融资。【原文：Italian tech firm Exein said on Wednesday a pick up in European defence spending was supporting its domestic growth, as it closed a funding round aimed at global expansion.】

item.title: 历峰集团公布销售额增长 6%，珠宝首饰打破奢侈品增长放缓的局面
item.description: 瑞士奢侈品集团历峰集团（Richemont）周三公布的季度销售额增长了 6%，这主要得益于卡地亚（Cartier）和梵克雅宝（Van Cleef & Arpels）品牌珠宝首饰的强劲需求，尽管整个奢侈品市场增长放缓。【原文：Swiss luxury group Richemont reported a 6% rise in quarterly sales on Wednesday, lifted by strong demand for jewellery from its Cartier and Van Cleef & Arpels brands, even as the broader luxury market slows.】

item.title: Jio Blackrock 获印度市场监管机构批准推出四只被动型基金
item.description: 印度证券交易委员会网站周三显示，Jio Blackrock 已获得印度市场监管部门的批准，将推出四只被动指数基金。【原文：Jio Blackrock has received approval from India's markets regulator to launch four passive index funds, the Securities and Exchange Board of India's website showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印尼称美国贸易协议是在 "非同寻常的斗争 "后达成的
item.description: 印尼周三表示，经过 "非同寻常的斗争"，印尼已与美国达成贸易协议，美国对印尼商品的拟议关税税率从32%降至19%。【原文：Indonesia said on Wednesday it had reached a trade deal with the United States after an "extraordinary struggle" in negotiations which resulted in a reduction of proposed U.S. tariff rates on Indonesian goods to 19% from 32%.】

item.title: ASML 警告称 2026 年可能无法实现增长
item.description: 全球最大的计算机芯片制造设备供应商阿斯麦公司（ASML）周三警告说，尽管其第二季度预订额超出市场预期，但2026年可能无法实现增长。【原文：ASML , the world's biggest supplier of computer chip-making equipment, on Wednesday warned it may not achieve growth in 2026, even after its second quarter bookings beat market expectations.】

item.title: 花旗集团高管表示，将把日本投资银行业务的员工数量最多提高 15
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）地区高级银行家表示，作为其促进亚太地区增长战略的一部分，花旗集团计划明年将其在日本的投资银行业务员工人数增加 10%至 15%，并在澳大利亚招聘新员工。【原文：Citigroup plans to raise its investment banking headcount in Japan by 10% to 15% over the next year and make new hires in Australia, as part of its strategy to bolster growth in the Asia Pacific, its top regional banker said.】

item.title: 瑞银日本任命前资深人士鸟山为全球银行业务主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，瑞士银行瑞银已重新聘用鸟山雅泉（Masazumi Toriyama）担任其日本分行全球银行部主管。【原文：Swiss Bank UBS has re-hired Masazumi Toriyama to head its Japanese unit's global banking division, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters and confirmed by the company on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美国 CPI 中的关税印记
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 创始人称中国新鹏将 2025 年招聘计划上调至 8000 人
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏公司创始人何小鹏在一次内部讲话中表示，公司今年的招聘计划已从6000人上调至8000人。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng's planned hires for this year have been revised up to 8,000 from 6,000, founder He Xiaopeng said in an internal speech.】

item.title: 新建工厂和美国贸易担忧推动中国 2025 年石脑油进口量创历史新高
item.description: 分析师和贸易商表示，由于新建工厂以及对美国丙烷和乙烷采购的谨慎态度，中国今年的石脑油进口量将达到创纪录水平，这将拉动需求，并支撑炼油厂的石化原料利润。【原文：China's naphtha imports will hit record levels this year as new plants and caution over U.S. propane and ethane purchases will drive demand and support refiners' margins for the petrochemical feedstock, analysts and traders said.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋称赞中国人工智能模型 "世界一流"
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋周三在北京的一次展览上称，中国公司深鉴科技、阿里巴巴和腾讯的人工智能模型是 "世界级的"，并称人工智能正在 "彻底改变 "供应链。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang described artificial intelligence models from Chinese firms Deepseek, Alibaba and Tencent as "world class" and said AI was "revolutionising" supply chains, at an exhibition in Beijing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印度航空坠机事件再次引发关于驾驶舱录像机的争论
item.description: 上个月发生的印度航空公司致命空难再次引发了航空业数十年来的一场争论，即安装摄像机监控航空公司飞行员的行为，以补充事故调查人员已经使用的驾驶舱语音和飞行数据记录仪。【原文：The deadly Air India crash last month has renewed a decades-old debate in the aviation industry over installing video cameras monitoring airline pilot actions to complement the cockpit voice and flight data recorders already used by accident investigators.】

item.title: 总理寻求与中国合作，必和必拓称建设澳大利亚绿色铁业成本过高
item.description: 澳大利亚与中国本周达成共识，将共同致力于钢铁供应链的去碳化，而钢铁供应链的碳排放量占全球排放量的近十分之一，在此之前，大型矿商必和必拓（BHP）表示，澳大利亚建设 "绿色钢铁 "产业的成本太高。【原文：Major miner BHP has said it is too costly for Australia to build a "green iron" industry after the country and China agreed this week to jointly work to decarbonise the steel supply chain, responsible for nearly a tenth of global emissions.】

item.title: 美国对巴西的贸易行为和数字支付服务展开调查
item.description: 美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）周二表示，他已对巴西的 "不公平 "贸易行为展开调查，一周前唐纳德-特朗普总统曾威胁对来自拉美最大经济体的进口商品征收 50%的关税。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said on Tuesday he had launched an investigation into Brazil's "unfair" trading practices, a week after President Donald Trump threatened a 50% tariff on imports from Latin America's largest economy.】
